entityName: MORGAN STANLEY SMITH BARNEY CHARTER WNT L.P.

EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.label: Entity Common Stock, Shares Outstanding
EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Indicate number of shares or other units outstanding of each of registrant's classes of capital or common stock or other ownership interests, if and as stated on cover of related periodic report. Where multiple classes or units exist define each class/interest by adding class of stock items such as Common Class A [Member], Common Class B [Member] or Partnership Interest [Member] onto the Instrument [Domain] of the Entity Listings, Instrument.

EntityPublicFloat.label: Entity Public Float
EntityPublicFloat.description: The aggregate market value of the voting and non-voting common equity held by non-affiliates computed by reference to the price at which the common equity was last sold, or the average bid and asked price of such common equity, as of the last business day of the registrant's most recently completed second fiscal quarter.

AdministrativeFeesExpense.label: Administrative Fees Expense
AdministrativeFeesExpense.description: Amount of expense for administrative services provided to the limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP) by the managing member or general partner, affiliate of managing member or general partner, or affiliate of LLC or LP, for example, but not limited to, salaries, rent, or overhead costs.

Assets.label: Assets
Assets.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are recognized. Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

AssetsFairValueDisclosure.label: Assets, Fair Value Disclosure
AssetsFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

Cash.label: Cash
Cash.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

CashSegregatedUnderCommodityExchangeActR.label: Cash Segregated under Commodity Exchange Act Regulation
CashSegregatedUnderCommodityExchangeActR.description: Cash deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers pursuant to the Commodity Exchange Act.

CommissionsPayableToBrokerDealersAndClea.label: Commissions Payable to Broker-Dealers and Clearing Organizations
CommissionsPayableToBrokerDealersAndClea.description: Amount payable to broker-dealers or clearing organizations for executing or clearing trades or orders.

DerivativeAssetFairValueGrossLiability.label: Derivative Asset, Fair Value, Gross Liability
DerivativeAssetFairValueGrossLiability.description: Fair value of liability associated with financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset.

DerivativeAssets.label: Derivative Asset
DerivativeAssets.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DerivativeAssetsLiabilitiesAtFairValueNe.label: Derivative Assets (Liabilities), at Fair Value, Net
DerivativeAssetsLiabilitiesAtFairValueNe.description: Fair values as of the balance sheet date of the net amount of all assets and liabilities resulting from contracts that meet the criteria of being accounted for as derivative instruments.

DerivativeCollateralObligationToReturnCa.label: Derivative, Collateral, Obligation to Return Cash
DerivativeCollateralObligationToReturnCa.description: Amount of obligation to return cash collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative assets.

DerivativeCollateralObligationToReturnSe.label: Derivative, Collateral, Obligation to Return Securities
DerivativeCollateralObligationToReturnSe.description: Amount of obligation to return securities collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative assets.

DerivativeCollateralRightToReclaimCash.label: Derivative, Collateral, Right to Reclaim Cash
DerivativeCollateralRightToReclaimCash.description: Amount of right to receive cash collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative liabilities.

DerivativeCollateralRightToReclaimSecuri.label: Derivative, Collateral, Right to Reclaim Securities
DerivativeCollateralRightToReclaimSecuri.description: Amount of right to receive securities collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative liabilities.

DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeAsset.label: Derivative Asset, Fair Value, Gross Asset
DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeAsset.description: Fair value, before effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes assets elected not to be offset. Excludes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement.

DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeAssetAmou.label: Derivative Asset, Fair Value, Amount Not Offset Against Collateral
DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeAssetAmou.description: Fair value, after offset of derivative liability, of financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, before offset against an obligation to return collateral under a master netting arrangement. Includes assets elected not to be offset. Excludes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement.

DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeAssetAmou.label: Derivative Asset, Fair Value, Amount Offset Against Collateral
DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeAssetAmou.description: Fair value, after effects of master netting arrangements, of financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset offset against an obligation to return collateral. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeLiability.label: Derivative Liability, Fair Value, Gross Liability
DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeLiability.description: Fair value, before effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes liabilities elected not to be offset. Excludes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.

DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeLiability.label: Derivative Liability, Fair Value, Amount Not Offset Against Collateral
DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeLiability.description: Fair value, after offset of derivative asset, of financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, elected not to be and before offset against a right to receive collateral under a master netting arrangement. Includes liabilities elected not to be offset. Excludes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.

DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeLiability.label: Derivative Liability, Fair Value, Amount Offset Against Collateral
DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeLiability.description: Fair value, after effects of master netting arrangements, of financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset offset against the right to receive collateral. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeNet.label: Derivative, Fair Value, Net
DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeNet.description: Fair value of the assets less the liabilities of a derivative or group of derivatives.

DerivativeLiabilities.label: Derivative Liability
DerivativeLiabilities.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DerivativeLiabilityFairValueGrossAsset.label: Derivative Liability, Fair Value, Gross Asset
DerivativeLiabilityFairValueGrossAsset.description: Fair value of asset associated with financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset.

DueToRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Due to Related Parties
DueToRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of obligations due all related parties.

FairValueAssetsLevel1ToLevel2TransfersAm.label: Fair Value, Assets, Level 1 to Level 2 Transfers, Amount
FairValueAssetsLevel1ToLevel2TransfersAm.description: Amount of transfers of assets measured on a recurring basis out of Level 1 of the fair value hierarchy into Level 2.

FairValueLiabilitiesLevel1ToLevel2Transf.label: Fair Value, Liabilities, Level 1 to Level 2 Transfers, Amount
FairValueLiabilitiesLevel1ToLevel2Transf.description: Amount of transfers of liabilities measured on a recurring basis out of Level 1 of the fair value hierarchy into Level 2.

FinancialInstrumentsOwnedDerivativesAndO.label: Financial Instruments, Owned, Derivatives and Other Contractual Agreements, at Fair Value
FinancialInstrumentsOwnedDerivativesAndO.description: The fair value as of the balance sheet date of firm holdings in all assets resulting from contracts that meet the criteria of being accounted for as derivative instruments. Their value is derived from the values of one or more underlying assets, reference rates, or indices of asset values. Includes both pledged (to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions) and unpledged holdings.

FloorBrokerageExchangeAndClearanceFees.label: Floor Brokerage, Exchange and Clearance Fees
FloorBrokerageExchangeAndClearanceFees.description: The amount of expense during the period for floor brokerage fees paid to other broker-dealers to execute trades on their behalf, stock exchange fees, order flow fees, and clearance fees.

ForeignCurrencyTransactionGainLossUnreal.label: Foreign Currency Transaction Gain (Loss), Unrealized
ForeignCurrencyTransactionGainLossUnreal.description: Amount before tax of foreign currency transaction unrealized gain (loss) recognized in the income statement.

GainLossOnDerivativeInstrumentsHeldForTr.label: Gain (Loss) on Derivative Instruments Held for Trading Purposes, Net
GainLossOnDerivativeInstrumentsHeldForTr.description: Aggregate net gain and losses (whether realized or unrealized) on all derivative instruments held for trading purposes whether or not settled physically.

GainLossOnSaleOfCommodityContracts.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Commodity Contracts
GainLossOnSaleOfCommodityContracts.description: The difference between the book value and the sale price of agreements to purchase or sell mineral resources, energy, and agricultural products at some future point. This element refers to the gain (loss) included in earnings and not to the cash proceeds.

GainLossRelatedToLitigationSettlement.label: Gain (Loss) Related to Litigation Settlement
GainLossRelatedToLitigationSettlement.description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in settlement of litigation and insurance claims. Excludes claims within an insurance entity's normal claims settlement process.

GeneralPartnersCapitalAccount.label: General Partners' Capital Account
GeneralPartnersCapitalAccount.description: The amount of the general partner's ownership interest.

GeneralPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsIssued.label: General Partners' Capital Account, Units Issued
GeneralPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsIssued.description: The number of general partner units issued.

GeneralPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsOutsta.label: General Partners' Capital Account, Units Outstanding
GeneralPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsOutsta.description: The number of general partner units outstanding.

IncentiveFeeExpense.label: Incentive Fee Expense
IncentiveFeeExpense.description: Amount of expense for incentive rights held by the managing member or general partner, of limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerOut.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Basic, Net of Tax
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerOut.description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations available to limited partnership (LP) unit-holder in a publicly trade limited partnership (LP) or master limited partnership (MLP).

IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

InterestIncomeOperating.label: Interest Income, Operating
InterestIncomeOperating.description: Amount of operating interest income, including, but not limited to, amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts on securities.

InterestReceivable.label: Interest Receivable
InterestReceivable.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of interest earned but not received. Also called accrued interest or accrued interest receivable.

InvestmentIncomeInterest.label: Investment Income, Interest
InvestmentIncomeInterest.description: Amount before accretion (amortization) of purchase discount (premium) of interest income on nonoperating securities.

InvestmentIncomeNet.label: Investment Income, Net
InvestmentIncomeNet.description: Amount after accretion (amortization) of discount (premium), and investment expense, of interest income and dividend income on nonoperating securities.

InvestmentOwnedAtFairValue.label: Investment Owned, at Fair Value
InvestmentOwnedAtFairValue.description: Value of the investment at close of period. For schedules of investments that are categorized, the value would be aggregated by category. For investment in and advances to affiliates, if operations of any controlled companies are different in character from those of the company, group such affiliates within divisions and by type of activities.

InvestmentOwnedPercentOfNetAssets.label: Investment Owned, Percent of Net Assets
InvestmentOwnedPercentOfNetAssets.description: Percent of net assets at close of period. For schedules of investments that are categorized, each category should have a percent of net assets for the aggregated value of the Investments in the category.

InvestmentOwnedUnrecognizedUnrealizedApp.label: Investment Owned, Unrecognized Unrealized Appreciation (Depreciation), Net
InvestmentOwnedUnrecognizedUnrealizedApp.description: This element represents the net excess or deficiency of the fair value of an investment (security, contract) over or under its cost (face amount, notional amount), respectively, which excess value or deficiency has not been recognized in earnings of the entity.

Liabilities.label: Liabilities
Liabilities.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all liabilities that are recognized. Liabilities are probable future sacrifices of economic benefits arising from present obligations of an entity to transfer assets or provide services to other entities in the future.

LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.label: Liabilities and Equity
LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.description: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

LiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.label: Financial and Nonfinancial Liabilities, Fair Value Disclosure
LiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value of financial and nonfinancial obligations.

LiabilitiesRelatedToInvestmentContractsF.label: Liabilities Related to Investment Contracts, Fair Value Disclosure
LiabilitiesRelatedToInvestmentContractsF.description: Fair value portion of liability related to investment contracts for example, but not limited to, guaranteed investment contract or annuities.

LimitedPartnersCapitalAccount.label: Limited Partners' Capital Account
LimitedPartnersCapitalAccount.description: The amount of the limited partners' ownership interests.

LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsIssued.label: Limited Partners' Capital Account, Units Issued
LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsIssued.description: The number of limited partner units issued.

LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsOutsta.label: Limited Partners' Capital Account, Units Outstanding
LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsOutsta.description: The number of limited partner units outstanding.

ManagementFeeExpense.label: Management Fee Expense
ManagementFeeExpense.description: Amount of expenses related to the managing member or general partner for management of the day-to-day business functions of the limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).

ManagementFeePayable.label: Management Fee Payable
ManagementFeePayable.description: Carrying amount of the unpaid portion of the fee payable to the managing member or general partner for management of the fund or trust.

NetIncomeLoss.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
NetIncomeLoss.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

NetIncomeLossAllocatedToGeneralPartners.label: Net Income (Loss) Allocated to General Partners
NetIncomeLossAllocatedToGeneralPartners.description: Aggregate amount of net income allocated to general partners.

NetIncomeLossAllocatedToLimitedPartners.label: Net Income (Loss) Allocated to Limited Partners
NetIncomeLossAllocatedToLimitedPartners.description: Aggregate amount of net income allocated to limited partners.

NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingGeneralPartne.label: Net Income (Loss), Per Outstanding General Partnership Unit (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingGeneralPartne.description: Net income (loss) allocated to each outstanding general partnership unit.

NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingGeneralPartne.label: Net Income (Loss), Per Outstanding General Partnership Unit, Net of Tax
NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingGeneralPartne.description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) available to general partnership (GP) unit-holder.

NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.label: Net Income (Loss), Per Outstanding Limited Partnership and General Partnership Unit, Basic and Diluted, Net of Tax
NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.description: The amount of net income or loss for the period per each limited partnership and general partnership unit in instances when basic and diluted earnings per unit are the same amount and aggregated on the face of the financial statements. Basic earnings per unit is the amount of net income or loss for the period per unit outstanding during the reporting period. Diluted earnings per unit includes the amount of net income or loss for the period available to each limited and general partnership unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of units for all dilutive potential units outstanding during the reporting period.

NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.label: Net Income (Loss), Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Basic (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.description: Net income (loss) allocated to each outstanding limited partnership unit.

NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.label: Net Income (Loss), Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Basic, Net of Tax
NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) available to outstanding limited partnership (LP) unit-holder.

NetRealizedOrUnrealizedGainLossOnTrading.label: Net Realized and Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Trading Securities
NetRealizedOrUnrealizedGainLossOnTrading.description: The sum of the realized and unrealized net gain (loss) on trading securities during the period.

NoninterestExpenseInvestmentAdvisoryFees.label: Noninterest Expense Investment Advisory Fees
NoninterestExpenseInvestmentAdvisoryFees.description: This represents the company's cost incurred during an accounting period for managing the money in a fund, which will be billed back to the client and is a component of noninterest expenses.

NoninterestExpenseRelatedToPerformanceFe.label: Noninterest Expense Related to Performance Fees
NoninterestExpenseRelatedToPerformanceFe.description: Incentive fees which are compensation paid to a trading advisor or to any practitioner who achieves investment results above a specified contractual level.

OperatingExpenses.label: Operating Expenses
OperatingExpenses.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

PartnersCapital.label: Partners' Capital
PartnersCapital.description: The amount of ownership interest of different classes of partners in limited partnership.

PartnersCapitalAccountRedemptions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Redemptions
PartnersCapitalAccountRedemptions.description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to redemptions and adjustments to redemption value. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountUnits.label: Partners' Capital Account, Units
PartnersCapitalAccountUnits.description: The number of each class of partnership units outstanding at the balance sheet date. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsRedeemed.label: Partners' Capital Account, Units, Redeemed
PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsRedeemed.description: The number of units redeemed during the year of each class of partners' capital account. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

PayablesToCustomers.label: Payables to Customers
PayablesToCustomers.description: Amounts payable to customers at the balance sheet date. The term customers generally excludes other broker-dealers; persons who are principal officers, directors, and stockholders; and persons whose securities or funds are part of the regulatory net capital of the broker-dealer. Another broker-dealer's account can be classified as a customer if the account is carried as an omnibus account in compliance with certain regulations. The accounts of principal officers, directors and stockholders may be combined in the customer captions if they are not material and the combination is disclosed in the oath that is required to accompany the annual audited FOCUS Report.

PrincipalTransactionsRevenue.label: Principal Transactions Revenue, Net
PrincipalTransactionsRevenue.description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) resulting from the difference between acquisition price and selling price or fair value of trading assets and trading liabilities, and from the firm's direct investment activity, conducted separately from customer trading activities, including, but not limited to, investments in private equity, alternative investment products, real estate, and exchanges and memberships.

ProceedsFromLegalSettlements.label: Proceeds from Legal Settlements
ProceedsFromLegalSettlements.description: Cash received for the settlement of litigation during the current period.

RealizedInvestmentGainsLosses.label: Realized Investment Gains (Losses)
RealizedInvestmentGainsLosses.description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment.

RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

SellingExpense.label: Selling Expense
SellingExpense.description: Expenses recognized in the period that are directly related to the selling and distribution of products or services.

TradingGainsLosses.label: Trading Gain (Loss)
TradingGainsLosses.description: Amount of gain (loss) resulting from the difference between the acquisition price and the selling price or fair value of trading assets and trading liabilities, conducted separately from customer trading activities. Includes, but is not limited to, changes in fair value of trading assets and trading liabilities.

TradingSecuritiesEquity.label: Trading Securities, Equity
TradingSecuritiesEquity.description: Fair value of investments in trading equity securities and other forms of trading securities that provide ownership interests.

TradingSecuritiesRealizedGainLoss.label: Trading Securities, Realized Gain (Loss)
TradingSecuritiesRealizedGainLoss.description: Amount of gain (loss) realized from securities classified as trading.

TradingSecuritiesUnrealizedHoldingGainLo.label: Trading Securities, Change in Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss)
TradingSecuritiesUnrealizedHoldingGainLo.description: Amount of unrealized holding gain (loss) recognized in the income statement for investments in debt and equity securities and other forms of securities that provide ownership interests classified as trading.

UnrealizedGainLossOnCommodityContracts.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Commodity Contracts
UnrealizedGainLossOnCommodityContracts.description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of open agreements to purchase or sell mineral resources, energy, and agricultural products at some future point held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Investments
UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

WeightedAverageNumberOfLimitedPartnershi.label: Weighted Average Number of Limited Partnership and General Partnership Unit Outstanding, Basic and Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfLimitedPartnershi.description: The average number of limited partnership and general partnership units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per limited partnership and general partnership unit.
